Developers
----------

Jerome "KingGuppy" Fisher
 - General idea and design structure, MIDI and audio handling.

"SergM"
 - Platform-specific MIDI and audio drivers. Improved MIDI synchronisation. MIDI player and converter. Extended UI.


Contributors
------------

Steven W. Dalton
 - Provided a new nice icon for use as the app logo.


Links with the mt32emu library from the Munt project.
http://munt.sourceforge.net/
